response.overview: Some of the hottest videos we ever shot of these two 18-year-old teens. Mandi Michaels was 18 years old and this was her 2nd movie. It was a lot of fun to make and Iâ€™m sure it will be a lot of fun to watch!! Mandi brings us the "Other" Side of Sex - she truly shows how much fun we could be having if we just let ourselves go! And we'll challenge anyone who can give better looks to the camera than Mandi! She'll make you feel that it's you she wants to go to bed with next
response.title: 18 And Still In School 2
